entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
